DOC.brief_summary: - Effects of autologous islet transplantation were compared to those of oral anti-diabetic drugs after distal pancreatectomy. - The primary interest is a insulin-secretory function after the surgery in two intervention groups.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Islet Autotransplantation Compared to Oral Antidiabetic Drug.
DOC.criteria: Patients who underwent distal pancreatectomy for pathologic diagnosis of pancreatic mass Prior history of diabetes mellitus Patients whose fasting, postload (75g OGTT) glucose or HbA1c level meet ADA diagnostic criteria Patients who refused to participate the study
